name: Cold Metal
description:
"Why is it that the more humans are put in one place, it is humanity that fades in the process?"

Cold Metal is a first-person exploration game set in a dystopian future. You're being hunted by H.A.L. Bots! Disable the security terminals to find out more about the world and regain your autonomy!

This game was created within GDU's 7-Day Game Launch Challenge.
